views.markdown:
Support added for iOS 10 and the iOS 10 Weather Widget. - Support added for iOS 9
- Support added for the latest version of Yahoo Weather
v5.0.2:
- Fix launching an alternate app when tapping on the weather in the Notification Centre in iOS 8.

v5.0.1:
- Fix crash when WeatherBoard is installed
- Fix touch areas for Forecast on the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+
v5.0.0:
- Added support for iOS 8 and replacing the data from The Weather Channel
Added support for iOS 8 and replacing the data from The Weather Channel. Added an option to show the BOM weather location name rather than the Yahoo location name. - Added support for the tweak LSWeather
- Added support for the tweak StatusbarWeather7
- Tested for iOS 7.1.x
v4.2.1:
- Fixed settings screen being blank.

v4.2.0:
- Added support for getting detailed weather information pop ups in LockInfo7.
- Added support for the new version of Yahoo Weather.
- Added support for the tweak StatusForecast.
v4.1.2: Support for Forecast 3.0.6. v4.1.1: Support for Forecast 3.0.4.

v4.1.0:
When the tweak Forecast is installed in iOS 7 you can tap on forecast information to show the BOM forecast description for that day, tap on the current temperature and today's high and low to show BOM details for the current weather conditions and tap on the hourly forecast information to show the BOM forecast description for today v4.0.1: Fix crash when Notification Centre is displayed.
v4.0.0: Support for iOS 7 and the iPhone 5S.
Support for BOM 3 hourly forecast to replace the yahoo hourly forecast.
Added support for getting BOM weather in WinterBoard html lock screens. Tested lock screens include:
- Carla LS
- Peekly
- LS Weather i5
- LS MosiacWeather
- LS Weathered
It should work for any WinterBoard html lock screen that uses Yahoo as the weather source, it will not work with lock screens that use AccuWeather for the weather source.
v3.1.2:
Fix a bug that stopped weather loading in the Yahoo weather app.

v3.1.1:
Added support for version 1.0.2 of the Yahoo weather app.

v3.1.0:
Added support for the new Yahoo weather app.

v3.0.3:
Fixed a bug where the apple weather app wouldn't launch by tapping the notification center weather widget.

v3.0.2:
The extended weather information now appears when tapping on the weather widget in LockInfo 5 and Forecast in iOS 6.

v3.0.1:
Added support for iOS 6.

v 3.0.0
Added the ability to tap on areas of the Notification Center to show detailed forecasts and observations from the BOM. Tapping on the current condition icon in the Notification Centre shows detailed information about the current conditions. Tapping on today's forecast temperature or any of the six day forecast icons in the Notification Centre shows full weather forecast from the BOM. v 2.2.1-1:
- Added an setting to show today's forecast as the current condition, so today's forecast icon is on the main Notification Center Weather Widget display.
- Added a link in the settings page to install "Australian BOM Siri Weather" which allows BOM weather in Siri.
Version 2.2.0-2:
Fixed spelling issues

v 2.2.0-1
A settings page has been added with:
- Enable/Disable toggle.
- Use Apparent Temperature option to use the Feels Like temperature instead of the actual temperature.
- Set the application that runs when you tap on the Notification Center Weather Widget. For example you can select to run WeatherZone or Pocket Weather instead of the default Weather Application when tapping on the Weather Widget
Yahoo logos in the Weather Application and Weather Notification Widget have been replaced with BOM logos.

Clicking on the new BOM logos opens detailed weather observations, forecasts and radar animations for the location
